mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO CART USING DUAL ON (product_no = #{productNo} AND id = #{id})
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cart_qty = cart_qty + #{cartQty} WHERE product_no = #{productNo} AND id = #{id} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_no, id, product_no, cart_qty) VALUES(cartseq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{productNo}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no , c.id , p.product_no , m.name , m.email, m.tel, m.address, m.point, p.product_name , p.product_image , c.cart_qty , p.product_price FROM member m, product p, cart c WHERE m.id = c.id AND p.product_no = c.product_no AND c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.coupon_no, c.coupon_title, c.coupon_discount, c.coupon_sdate, c.coupon_edate, u.id FROM coupon c, ucoupon u WHERE u.id = #{id} AND c.coupon_no = u.coupon_no AND u.ucoupon_used = 0 AND sysdate between coupon_sdate and coupon_edate ORDER BY coupon_edate desc
